Posts.Title: Question about my path report S3K5 SpunkyGirl

Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2008 03:54PM corkyandme wrote: Keep in mind, by the time these numbers are written in a book, progress has been made. I also started out reading everything that was published with regard to breast cancer. Then reality stepped in. How long did it take to have someone write the very book you are reading? What was the time frame on publishing the book? Science doesn't wait for the book to be written and sold! There have been so many breakthroughs in such a short time, no real book can keep up with the positive results! Before you decide on your future, check the published year, and updates available online with regard to numbers first.
